original_text: (The other beasts had been stripped of their authority, but were allowed to live for a period of time.)
korean_text: 그 남은 짐승들은 그의 권세를 빼앗겼으나 그 생명은 보존되어 정한 시기가 이르기를 기다리게 되었더라

sentences.original_text: The other beasts had been stripped of their authority
but were allowed to live for a period of time
sentences.korean_translation: 하지만 일정 기간 동안 살도록 허락받았다
